text: Znayte, shcho zhyttya v tsʹomu sviti — lyshe hra ta zabava, prykrasy ta khvastoshchi pomizh vamy, zmahannya u zbilʹshenni mayna ta ditey — podibne vono doshchu, pislya yakoho posivy dyvuyutʹ siyacha; dali ty bachysh yikh zhovtymy, a potim vony vsykhayutʹ. A v maybutnʹomu zhytti — kara zhorstoka abo proshchennya vid Allaha ta vdovolennya Yoho. I zhyttya v tsʹomu sviti — nishcho inshe yak blaha prymarni
